content.new:
When making several walking trajectories, eventually Atlas will stop mid trajectory. Usually it only takes 2 or 3 trajectories to get to this point. Re-issuing a basic walk command causes Atlas to respond much more erratically.

This is an issue curren

When making several walking trajectories, eventually Atlas will stop mid trajectory. Usually it only takes 2 or 3 trajectories to get to this point. Re-issuing a basic walk command causes Atlas to respond much more erratically.

issue.title: Walking stops mid-trajectory with Atlas Sim Interface 1.1.0
